FuncDef:
The arp-proxy command enables the ARP proxy among users on the same BAS interface.
The undo arp-proxy command disables the ARP proxy among users on the same BAS interface.
By default, the ARP proxy is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The ARP proxy among users on different interfaces or VLANs is always enabled and is not affected by this command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
